content.rendered:
American Airlines

Dimensions should not exceed 18 x 14 x 8 inches (45 x 35 x 20 cm ).

Carry-on requirements

  • Shouldn’t exceed 22 x 14 x 9 inches / 56 x 36 x 23 centimeters

American Airlines Checked Baggage

American Airlines Excess Baggage

excerpt.rendered: American Airlines Dimensions should not exceed 18 x 14 x 8 inches (45 x 35 x 20 cm ). Carry-on requirements Shouldn’t exceed 22 x 14 x 9 inches / 56 x 36 x 23 centimeters American Airlines Checked Baggage American Airlines Excess Baggage
